title: Can't log into client
body:
After restarting the client, the first time I try logging in I get this message: http://prntscr.com/hlddsb . 

If I try again after that all I get is this: http://prntscr.com/hlde2g . So far it hasn't stopped.

Any fixes for this?

replies.body: Hey this is being looked into, but it does look like some players on the west are having login issues.  Digital Ram will be providing updates in this [pinned thread.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yge8oqun-1292017-na-authentication-issues-on-west-coast)

Having the same issue for 30 minutes. They seem to be working on it:

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7qjAF9Z6,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-12-09T22:24:30.385+0000)
>
> Hey guys!  I dug into this and it looks like there are login issues impacting players in the West/Southwest (USA).   You may experience issues logging in or getting stuck at the authentication server.  Players who are already logged in should be able to play without issue.  I don't have anymore info right now, but I'll do my best to offer updates as I find them.  Hang tight!
Its an issues that Western/South western players are getting. We're not sure what the issue is but I think someone is currently looking into it.
